channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: UK financial watchdog to crypto industry: ‘Let’s work together’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: The Financial Conduct Authority wants input from crypto companies on moving forward with regulations.

item.title: Apple’s outside payments ban ruled as unlawful in likely win for NFTs and crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Unless Apple appeals the decision and has the ruling overturned, developers are free to direct app users to their own systems to make purchases.

item.title: Third time’s the charm? ARK and 21Shares again file with SEC for Bitcoin ETF
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Cathie Wood’s ARK and crypto investment firm 21Shares are tripling down on their attempt to get approval to create a spot Bitcoin ETF in the U.S.

item.title: FTX sells LedgerX for $50M to affiliate of Miami-based exchange holding company
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The futures and options exchange was purchased by FTX.US in 2021 to expand its spot trading services. Three other FTX assets remain up for sale.

item.title: Bitcoin advocates rally at Texas State Capitol to oppose bill cutting mining incentives
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: “When you target one industry the way they are with this bill, that’s bad policy no matter what the industry you’re targeting,” said Satoshi Action Fund CEO Dennis Porter.

item.title: Binance.US backs out of $1B Voyager asset purchase, blames regulatory environment
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The parties got the go-ahead on the deal last week after overcoming several objections, but Binance.US changed its mind.

item.title: Bitcoin’s price is down 10% — New bear market or correction?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: On this week’s episode of The Market Report, Cointelegraph’s resident expert discusses if the latest price of Bitcoin is a sign of a new bear market starting or just a healthy correction.

item.title: Majority of creditors want Hodlnaut liquidated
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Only 2.42% of claimants favor restructuring, and they are almost exclusively company directors. Withdrawals were frozen in August.

item.title: Google Cloud broadens Web3 startup program with 11 blockchain firms
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Along with Google, 11 blockchain firms are now part of the Google Web3 startup program to help accelerate startups.

item.title: EU data watchdog warns of ‘hell’ scenario for US AI companies
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Europe's data protection supervisor predicts trouble abroad and at home for U.S. AI companies that run afoul of GDPR.

item.title: Bitcoin price can ‘easily’ hit $20K in next 4 months — Philip Swift
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: The BTC price bottom may be in, but Bitcoin bulls are not out of the woods yet, says the DecenTrader and Look Into Bitcoin founder.

item.title: Global impact of a Bitcoin soccer club: Decentralize with Cointelegraph
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joe Hall
item.description: Can a Bitcoin-boosted football club breathe life into a tired town in the United Kingdom? This week’s “Decentralize with Cointelegraph” podcast tours Bedford.

item.title: Bitcoin price hits new record high in Argentina
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: Argentina’s peso has crashed by 99% versus the U.S. dollar since the beginning of the currency crisis in 2018.

item.title: How to stake Polkadot (DOT)?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tanuj Surve
item.description: Still haven’t figured out how to stake Polkadot (DOT)? Worry not; this article provides a step-by-step guide on where and how to stake DOT.

item.title: Genesis settlement disrupted by new creditor demands, DCG says
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Under the initial settlement plan, Genesis creditors were expected to receive 80% recovery of funds lost due to the bankruptcy.

item.title: Opera integrates generative AI in the latest browser update
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The multi-platform web browser Opera announced its forthcoming version, Opera One, will have a plethora of new features, including the in-browser integration of generative AI.

item.title: Blockchain and crypto leaders converged at DAO Tokyo as Japan increases adoption
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tamara Soykina
item.description: Japan has taken strides of late to adopt and integrate decentralized technologies within both government and businesses.

item.title: 5 real-world applications of natural language processing (NLP)
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Chatbots, sentiment analysis, speech recognition, text summarization and machine translation are some examples of real-world applications of NLP.

item.title: The gamble of crypto airdrop hunting and what it means for blockchain devs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Stephen Katte
item.description: Airdrop hunting can be a lucrative enterprise, but it can also have significant financial risks attached.

item.title: Do Kwon seeks SEC charges dismissal as S.Korea rules LUNA a non-security
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The South Korean district court recently dismissed security violation charges against Terra co-founder Hyun-seong Shin, deeming LUNA a non-security under Korea’s Capital Markets Act.

item.title: Crypto community split on Coinbase NFT’s push for ‘sensible crypto policy’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: A Twitter user expressed uncertainty over NFTs having any impact but admitted that it makes them feel like they did something.

item.title: OpenSea ‘insider trading’ trial kicked off in New York district court
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: The court case might have a decisive influence on the legal classification of NFTs.

item.title: Vitalik Buterin and Indian yogi Sadhguru discuss tech, identity and more
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: In a virtual conversation hosted by the reState Foundation, the two thought leaders joined together to talk about the direction of the future of technology and human consciousness.

item.title: CFTC proposes reducing anonymity to manage risks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Commodity Futures Trading Commission Commissioner Christy Goldsmith Romero has urged crypto companies to verify the digital identity of users, saying that Congress is considering new laws addressing anonymity and digital identity.

item.title: Terraform Labs co-founder and nine others indicted in South Korea
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The indictment of 10 individuals associated with Terraform Labs, including co-founder Hyun-seong Shin, comes after 11 months of investigation into the collapse of Terra.

item.title: Bitcoin price flatlines near $27K — What can trigger the next move?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin faces a new round of potential volatility catalysts over the coming week after BTC price sheds 10%.

item.title: Stablecoin payments: Visa shares plans for ‘ambitious’ crypto product
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Visa’s upcoming crypto product is designed to drive mainstream adoption of public blockchain networks and stablecoin payments.

item.title: 5 charged by DOJ over alleged crypto price manipulation scheme
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Five people have been charged in relation to alleged market manipulation of an Ethereum-based token called “Hydro.”

item.title: Decentralized exchange GMX votes to use Chainlink low-latency oracles
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: A Chainlink exec said the oracles will improve GMX’s security by providing a more “strong degree of tamper-resistance when settling user trades.”

item.title: Third round of ETH withdrawals sees roughly equal amounts of deposits: Data
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: Another chunk of ETH has been withdrawn due to Kraken, but deposits going onto the network have almost matched them.
